sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import '../styles/CharityEvents.css'; export default class CharityEvents extends React.Component{ state = { display: false } showDescription = e => { if(this.state.display){ this.setState({ display: false }) }else{ this.setState({ display: true }) } } render(){ return(
DATE: {this.props.event_date} TYPE: {this.props.event_type}
TITLE: {this.props.event_title}
DESCRIPTION: {this.props.event_description}
RESPOND TO THIS
MESSAGE
) } }
